name: (The Game From) THE ELDER
description:
Imagine if the 1981 KISS album "(Music From) THE ELDER" was a big success, and spawned, besides other merchandise, a video game...

This little game tries to give us a glimpse at what could have been.

Go back to 1981, rediscover "THE ELDER" anew.

 Let the odyssey begin...

Game created in "Bitsy" by Markus Bruckner, Austria, 2021.

Have Fun and Rock On!
